text: Sach bolun toh recruiter ka reply na aana tumhari galti nahi hoti. Yeh cheez mujhe kaafi late samajh aayi.
Maine yeh cheez hard way se seekhi hai: career growth straight line mein nahi hoti.
Unpopular opinion: rejections do not define your capability.
Unpopular opinion: silence from recruiters is a system failure, not a personal one.
Unpopular opinion: skills matter more than job titles.
Sach bolun toh recruiter ka reply na aana tumhari galti nahi hoti. Yeh cheez mujhe kaafi late samajh aayi.
Hard truth: career growth is not always linear. Most people realize this very late in their career.
If you are struggling right now, remember this: rejections do not define your capability. You are not alone.
Nobody talks about this but burnout is often mistaken as lack of discipline. Read that again.
I learned this the hard way: silence from recruiters is a system failure, not a personal one.
Unpopular opinion par sach yeh hai ki skills, title se zyada important hoti hain.
